content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
CAUTION — low volatility, narrow participation. Vol: 13.1% (20d XU100); Breadth: 2/8 sectors positive (narrow advance).

2. Which sectors are leading?
Construction & REIT and Energy & Chemicals are leading: ALARK (1W: +4.49% | 1M: +9.86%) ABOVE TREND; GUBRF (1W: +10.93% | 1M: +13.18%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Technology & Telecom and Transportation are lagging: KONTR (1W: -10.89% | 1M: -66.72%) BELOW TREND; PGSUS (1W: -4.53% | 1M: +0.74%) CORRECTION.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
GUBRF (1W: +10.93% | 1M: +13.18%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +7.11% | 1M: +22.55%) ABOVE TREND; ALARK (1W: +4.49% | 1M: +9.86%) ABOVE TREND; TRALT (1W: +3.98% | 1M: +16.58%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +3.76% | 1M: +5.91%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
KONTR (1W: -10.89% | 1M: -66.72%) BELOW TREND; KRDMD (1W: -6.12% | 1M: +4.57%) CORRECTION; PGSUS (1W: -4.53% | 1M: +0.74%) CORRECTION; YKBNK (1W: -4.51% | 1M: +0.40%) CORRECTION; VESTL (1W: -4.39% | 1M: -10.56%) BELOW TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
Upside momentum: GUBRF (1W: +10.93% | 1M: +13.18%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +7.11% | 1M: +22.55%) ABOVE TREND; ALARK (1W: +4.49% | 1M: +9.86%) ABOVE TREND. Downside momentum: KONTR (1W: -10.89% | 1M: -66.72%) BELOW TREND; KRDMD (1W: -6.12% | 1M: +4.57%) CORRECTION.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Cautious — breadth weak and selective strength in state names. HALKB (1W: +3.47% | 1M: +7.13%) ABOVE TREND; AKBNK (1W: -3.55% | 1M: +8.63%) CORRECTION; ISCTR (1W: -3.50% | 1M: +1.42%) CORRECTION.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Mixed — defense and autos leading while some steel and appliances lag. ASELS (1W: +7.11% | 1M: +22.55%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +3.22% | 1M: +9.12%) ABOVE TREND; EREGL (1W: -2.93% | 1M: -0.17%) BELOW TREND; VESTL (1W: -4.39% | 1M: -10.56%) BELOW TREND.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Resilient within narrow market participation; commodity-sensitive names outperform. GUBRF (1W: +10.93% | 1M: +13.18%) ABOVE TREND; TRALT (1W: +3.98% | 1M: +16.58%) ABOVE TREND; TUPRS (1W: +0.27% | 1M: -4.69%) RECOVERY.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Under CAUTION trim exposure to beaten-up cyclicals and weak tech; overweight selective winners in Construction & Energy and quality large-cap banks; keep defensive cash buffer for potential breadth reversals.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
GUBRF (1W: +10.93% | 1M: +13.18%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +7.11% | 1M: +22.55%) ABOVE TREND; KONTR (1W: -10.89% | 1M: -66.72%) BELOW TREND; KRDMD (1W: -6.12% | 1M: +4.57%) CORRECTION.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Construction & REIT (leadership narrow); Energy & Chemicals (commodity sensitivity); Technology & Telecom (continued downside risk).

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Watch XU100 reaction to the month-end flows and global risk tone — sustainment above recent 1M highs would validate the narrow advance, failure to hold weekly support risks broader pullback; catalysts: TRY moves, CBT commentary, oil prices, and Q4 results/earning season flow.

## EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Low-volatility, narrow participation market (CAUTION): Construction & REIT and Energy names are driving gains while tech and transport lag hard. Maintain selective exposure to confirmed leaders, keep size discipline and a cash buffer for a potential breadth-driven reversal.
